text: Hey Sam, it’s totally fine if you have other stuff going on outside of your studies - I would be worried if you were spending too much time working! But I do need you to be mindful that I am also taking time out of my day to set up discussion with you. If you can’t make it to a scheduled chat I just need you to check in with me so that we can rearrange, just as you would do in the workplace.

You always have the option of leaving me a message on here that I can get back to in my own time.
If you can give me some names of companies you want to contact then I can see if I have any friends there to introduce you. If you can be specific that will help us to get the ball rolling.
(This is under no guarantee that they will have time to chat to you - it’s up to you to continue your own job hunt I’m sure you understand.)

I know I am working in film which is very different from games, but I have also worked in the games industry myself as a 3D artist and Concept Artist; so I do have some personal experience you might find interesting to hear about.... but I will wait for you to ask those questions :blush:
I have checked in with the Prospela team to find out what time limits we have for the mentoring programme and I will get back to you as soon as I know.
Have a great weekend and I look forward to hearing from you soon! :beach_with_umbrella:
